attributes.review: the app took way too long to download and once it did it took up almost 90% of my phone’s storage and made it lag immensely >:( absolutely unacceptable. do not get this app or you won’t be able to do much else on your phone. delete immediately to save your phone from constantly crashing and glitching! terrible.
attributes.title: the worst app ever
